LocaleResource.Name: AdminInstruction
LocaleResource.Value: Enter your data below to configure this plugin.

LocaleResource.Name: IsActive.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies whether megamenu will be rendered for this category.

LocaleResource.Name: DisplayCategoryPicture.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies whether a category picture will be displayed in the first column (on the right side of dropdown).

LocaleResource.Name: DisplayBgPicture.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies whether a backgrund picture for the catgory dropdown will be displayed.

LocaleResource.Name: BgPictureId.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The background picture of the catgory dropdown.

LocaleResource.Name: BgAlignX.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies the horizontal alignment of background picture.

LocaleResource.Name: BgAlignY.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies the vertical alignment of background picture.

LocaleResource.Name: BgOffsetX.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies the horizontal offset of background picture.

LocaleResource.Name: BgOffsetY.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies the vertical offset of background picture.

LocaleResource.Name: MaxItemsPerColumn.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies the maximum of items in one column.

LocaleResource.Name: MaxSubItemsPerCategory
LocaleResource.Value: maximum of sub items per category

LocaleResource.Name: MaxSubItemsPerCategory.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies the maximum of sub items per category.

LocaleResource.Name: Summary.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies text that will be displayed below the category picture. This text will only be displayed if the category picture is displayed. Html is allowed.

LocaleResource.Name: TeaserHtml.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Replaces menu columns and displays the defined HTML instead.

LocaleResource.Name: HtmlColumnSpan.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Ranges from columns 1-4. 4 means no sub categories will be displayed. Html display and column span count start on the right side of the dropdown.

LocaleResource.Name: TeaserType.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Defines the type of the teaser.

LocaleResource.Name: TeaserRotatorItemSelectType.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Defines the kind in which the rotatoritem will be choosen. The types deep-top, deep-random are implying to include sub categories when considering products.

LocaleResource.Name: BadgeText.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: defines the badge text next to the category.

LocaleResource.Name: BadgeLabel.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Defines the badge type next to the category.

LocaleResource.Name: DisplaySubItemsInline.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Determines whether sub-items will be displayed separated by comma.

LocaleResource.Name: AllowSubItemsColumnWrap.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Determines whether sub-items can be broken into a new comlumn.

LocaleResource.Name: SubItemsWrapTolerance.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies a treshold which defines a tolarance value.

LocaleResource.Name: FavorInMegamenu.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies whether the category should be favored when building the nav structure (only applies to categories within the dropdown).

LocaleResource.Name: ProductRotatorInterval.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies the interval after which the rotator scrolls to the next element.

LocaleResource.Name: ProductRotatorDuration.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies the duration the rotator needs to scroll to the next element.

LocaleResource.Name: ProductRotatorCycle.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies whether the product rotator scrolls back to the first element after reaching the last scrollable element.

LocaleResource.Name: MenuMinHeight.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies the minimum height of dropdown menus.
